headline: Operational Gains and Planned Divestments Might Change The Case For Investing In Occidental Petroleum (OXY)
summary: In recent months, Occidental Petroleum advanced its exploration and international operations, strengthened reserves, and continued prioritizing debt reduction through planned non-core asset divestments in 2025. These efforts have contributed to an exceptional net income growth record and are expected to support further profitability improvements as the company increases reinvestment and modestly raises its payout ratio over the next three years. We will explore how Occidental's operational...
